text: @CBSNews One quarter of ALL covid19 deaths were  in New York. He, personally, killed 6000 seniors with his agenda of putting covid + people in his nursing homes. And you celebrate him??? Are you on crack??? I know Biden is a problem for marxists like you but this aint it.
